extends Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    V1Span.Builder addAnnotation​(long timestamp, String value, Endpoint endpoint)
    Sets V1Span.annotations()
    V1Span.Builder addBinaryAnnotation​(String key, String value, Endpoint endpoint)
    Creates a tag annotation, which is the same as Span.tags() except duplicating the endpoint.
    V1Span.Builder addBinaryAnnotation​(String address, Endpoint endpoint)
    Creates an address annotation, which is the same as Span.remoteEndpoint()

      public V1Span.Builder addBinaryAnnotation​(String address, Endpoint endpoint)
      Creates an address annotation, which is the same as Span.remoteEndpoint()

    • addBinaryAnnotation

      public V1Span.Builder addBinaryAnnotation​(String key, String value, Endpoint endpoint)
      Creates a tag annotation, which is the same as Span.tags() except duplicating the endpoint.

      A key of "lc" and empty value substitutes for Span.localEndpoint().

    • debug

      public V1Span.Builder debug​(@Nullable Boolean debug)
      Sets V1Span.debug()

    • build

      public V1Span build()
